message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $15,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Can you consider that?
Thanks for your interest, Bob. While $10,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $13,500. I believe this product would bring you a lot of value.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $13,500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $11,000. Can you consider that?
